resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>

      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>e2df5a86-e8e0-426d-b42e-0007c6984ace#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az egyenes és pontjai</string>
            <string language="en">Line and its points</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile und seine Punkte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ligne et ses points</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linha e seus pontos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riga ed i relativi punti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμή και τα σημεία του</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Línea y sus puntas</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az egyenes és pontjainak szemléltetése.</string>
            <string language="en">Demonstration of line and its points</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">11. osztály,  kép,  </string>
            <string language="en">11. class, picture, </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Demonstration der Zeile und seiner Punkte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Démonstration de ligne et de ses points</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Demonstração da linha e dos seus pontos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dimostrazione della riga e dei relativi punti</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδειξη της γραμμής και των σημείων του</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Demostración de la línea y de sus puntas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">11. Kategorie, Abbildung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">11. classe, image,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">11. classe, retrato,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">11. codice categoria, immagine,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">11, κλάση, εικόνα,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">11. clase, cuadro,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <classification>

            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

            <taxon>
              <id>790</id>

        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
